sentences.sentence: The bowman is dependent for real efficiency on his bodily strength much more than the arquebusier.
sentences.translation: 与火绳枪手相比，弓箭手依赖的是自身体能。

sentences.sentence: A bowman can let off six aimed shots in a minute, an arquebusier only one in two or three minutes, when he has gone through all his manual exercise carefully.
sentences.translation: 一名弓箭手可以每分钟瞄准射击六次，而一名火绳枪手只能每两三分钟射击一次，这还是在他严格按照程序操作的情况下。
